alert.note: Alert for Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 6:18AM PST until January 19 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches and total ice accumulation of up to a tench of an inch. * WHERE...Worley, Post Falls, Downtown Spokane, Fourth Of July Pass, Rockford, Osburn, Cheney, Wallace, Spokane Valley, Lookout Pass, Hayden, Airway Heights, Fernwood, Mullan, Davenport, Kellogg, Dobson Pass, Coeur d`Alene, Pinehurst, St. Maries, and Fairfield. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 9 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and walking surfaces. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and Friday evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Idaho, for the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. In Washington, for the latest travel information in Washington, go to https://wsdot.wa.gov/travel
